facility.name: compact
facility.description: The compact facility contains high rate compact events.

event.name: time_heartbeat
event.description: System time values sent periodically to detect cycle counter rollovers. Useful when only the 32 LSB of the TSC are saved in events header : we save the full 64 bits in this event. Put here for core.xml facility compatibility.

event.name: time_heartbeat_full
event.description: System time, full 64 bits TSC. Saved before trace restart. Forced write, even if trace is stopped.

event.name: event_b
event.description: Compact event with 4 bytes of data

event.name: event_c
event.description: Compact event with 8 bytes of data
